  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112107</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112107</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Prometni znaki</string>
            <string language="en">Traffic signs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verkehrszeichen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Poteaux de signalisation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sinais de tráfego</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Segnali stradali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημάδια κυκλοφορίας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Señales de tráfico</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Poznavanje in razumevanje prometnih znakov je ena od vsebin prometne vzgoje. Pri usposabljanju za vožnjo s kolesom učenci spoznajo najpomembnejše prometne znake za pešce in kolesarje. S pomočjo učnega lista preverimo, če so učenci osvojili ta znanaj!</string>
            <string language="en">Recognizing and understanding most common traffic signs that are present when cycling.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">promet</string>
            <string language="en">traffic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">predpisi</string>
            <string language="en">regulation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">prometni znak</string>
            <string language="en">traffic sign</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kolo</string>
            <string language="en">bicycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die meisten geläufigen Verkehrszeichen erkennen 
und verstehend, die beim Radfahren anwesend sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Reconnaissance et arrangement la plupart des 
poteaux de signalisation communs qui sont présents en faisant un 
cycle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reconhecendo e compreendendo a maioria de sinais 
de tráfego comuns que estão atuais ao dar um ciclo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riconoscendo e capendo la maggior parte dei 
segnali stradali comuni che sono presenti quando cicla.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναγνωρίζοντας και καταλαβαίνοντας τα περισσότερα 
κοινά σημάδια κυκλοφορίας που είναι παρόντα κατά την 
ανακύκλωση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reconociendo y entendiendo la mayoría de las 
señales de tráfico comunes que están presentes al completar un 
ciclo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verkehr</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regelung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verkehrszeichen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fahrrad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le trafic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">règlement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poteau de signalisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bicyclette</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tráfego</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">regulamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sinal de tráfego</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bicicleta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">traffico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">regolazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">segnale stradale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">bicicletta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κυκλοφορία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κανονισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σημάδι κυκλοφορίας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ποδήλατο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tráfico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">regulación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">señal de tráfico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">bicicleta</string>
          </keyword>
